documents.title: our live coverage has ended
text: regular live coverage on this page has ended for the day , but breaking news , sport and travel updates will continue to appear through the night .
east midlands live returns from 08:00 tomorrow morning .

documents.title: east midlands weather : yellow warning for ice
text: the met office has issued a yellow weather warning for ice , which will remain in place until 11:00 tomorrow .
icy patches are expected to develop overnight but it will be a dry evening for most with clear skies and some frost forming .
it will be a frosty but dry start to tomorrow for most with plenty of winter sunshine and temperatures reaching 4c ( 39f ) .
author: Anna Church
Weather Presenter, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: prince harry praises nottingham project
text: prince harry has personally praised a nottingham project he 's been supporting through one of his charities .
he said full effect in st ann 's has enabled young people from disadvantaged backgrounds to have a voice and speak honestly .
he spoke about the charity as he guest edited bbc radio 4 's today programme .
the community recording studio has been helping young people for 20 years .
it 's now being supported by prince harry 's royal foundation and he has told the bbc it 's making a huge difference .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: a1 lane closure following an accident
text: one lane is closed on the a1 northbound near tuxford because of an accident .
# a1 northbound between # b1164 and # a6075 # tuxford we have 1 lane closed due to a collision .
long delays on the approach from the # b1164 # suttonontrent .
please allow extra time or use an alternative route if possible .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: in picture : wintry scenes from the region
text: there has been plenty of snow in leicestershire .
this was taken in east farndon near market harborough this morning
this was the scene in bonsall moor , near matlock today
there was even some of the white stuff in mansfield woodhouse this afternoon too .
and this was bakewell in derbyshire today .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: man charged with burglary offences
text: a 42-year-old man has been charged with burglary offences in ravenshead and kirkby-in-ashfield .
nottinghamshire police said one burglary happened in longdale lane on 19 december and an aggravated burglary in sutton road two days later .
the man has been charged with one count of burglary , one count of aggravated burglary and possessing a knife in a public place .
he has been remanded in custody .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: robber absconds from sudbury prison
text: a 29-year-old man convicted of robbery and theft has absconded from hmp sudbury in derbyshire .
navarone dominic mcintosh was sentenced to four years in prison at birmingham crown court in february 2016 .
mcintosh has family in birmingham and the west midlands .
police have asked anyone with information about mcintosh 's whereabouts to contact them .

documents.title: sponsor sought for new school
text: nottinghamshire county council is looking for sponsors to run a new primary school .
as part of plans to build new homes on the former rolls-royce site in hucknall , developers are also building a new free school .
county councillor phillip owen said : `` this new school is now essential to meet projected demand from the new housing development .
it will grow in size from the bottom up and mean that convenient school places will be available to families as they move in , which will in turn make the housing development more attractive . ''
interested sponsors will need to be department for education approved and can come in the form of a single academy , a multi-academy trust or a diocese , he said .
potential sponsors have until 5 february to submit their application .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: 'man suffers facial injuries during assault '
text: a 51-year-old man suffered injuries to his nose and mouth during an assault in derby .
derbyshire police said the man `` staggered from abbotts barn close to gerard street leaving a trail of blood '' after the attack on 19 december .
the man was taken to royal derby hospital for treatment .
a 62-year-old man was arrested over the assault and has since been released while inquiries continue .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: vehicle fire causes m1 delays
text: one lane is closed on the m1 northbound between junctions 28 for alfreton and 29 for chesterfield because of a vehicle fire .
this is causing traffic to back up to junction 27 for hucknall .
lane 2 reopened 1 lane ( of 4 ) now closed on the # m1 northbound between j28 and j29 due to a car fire .
the fire service are on scene .
there are delays of half an hour on approach so please allow extra time for your journey .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: university loans award-winning art work from library
text: people in leicester will have the chance to display award-winning art work in their own homes as part of a new scheme by de montfort university .
the university has a new art-lending library where members of the public can borrow works of art .
the library has been opened by glasgow-based artists neil bromwich and zoe walker .
there are 57 pieces of art for loan including work by two turner prize-nominated artists , ciara phillips and marvin gaye chetwynd .

mr bromwich , who was born in leicester , said : `` to actually have the one-to-one relationship living with the contemporary piece of art in your own home is a really different experience of enjoying and appreciating art . ''
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: flooding closes a46
text: the a46 southbound near upper broughton is closed this afternoon because of flooding .
the # a46 is closed southbound between the # a606 and the # a6006 near upper broughton due to flooding .
our area team are en-route to scene .
traffic is being diverted via local routes .
is it possible to get into the a46 southbound from the a6006 ?
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: teen arrested over gun after street fight
text: two other boys were also arrested following an altercation in nottingham city centre on boxing day .

documents.title: victory for manager as team beat nottingham forest
text: lee bullen earned victory in his first game as interim manager as sheffield wednesday ended a seven-game winless run by beating nottingham forest .
adam reach 's superb long-range shot and a jordan rhodes penalty put the owls in control of an open match at the break .
forest had missed four decent chances to level , notably through barrie mckay .
but they were second best after rhodes ' spot-kick and reach teed up lucas joao to seal an emphatic win and consign forest to a fourth loss in six .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: lanes reopen after second m1 crash
text: all lanes have reopened on the m1 southbound between junctions 21a and 21 in leicestershire following an accident .
there are still delays of up to 45 minutes .
all lanes have now reopened on the # m1 southbound between j21a and j21 following the earlier collision .
delays of 45 minutes remain but should now start to clear .

hi matthew , there are still severe delays .
we can see from cctv that police have now closed the carriageway at j3 .
our traffic officers are continuing to assist stuck vehicles and get traffic moving again .
please consider alternative routes .
thank you for the swift response .
is the a1 north bound and m62 west bound free of incidents ?
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: train delays in the region
text: there are some delays to train services on the sheffield / nottingham / london route because of horses on the line near wellingborough .
heavy snow near market harborough earlier also caused some delays but this has now cleared and trains are running as normal .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

text: worth noting if you are heading in this direction .
two lanes are closed on the m1 southbound between junctions 21a and 21 near leicestershire because of a crash .

documents.title: power set to be restored later than planned
text: western power distribution ( wpd ) says power should be restored to thousands of homes across the midlands by 18:00 this evening .
it originally said it hoped to have 200 faults caused by snowfall repaired by midday .
wpd said earlier there were more than 11,000 homes still affected - and about 7,800 of them were in the west midlands , with warwickshire and worcestershire the worst affected .
# powercut update for # westmidlands region .
engineers are working to restore power to supplies affected by faults in the region .
we estimate supplies to be restored by 18:00 .
apologies for the disruption .

we are not aware of any problems in that area sorry .
please could you call us on 0800 67583 105 , rod .
the whole area is down
we are not aware of any problems in the area at the moment .

documents.title: car crashes after police chase
text: this audi crashed into a wall after a police pursuit in stenson road , derby , last night .
derbyshire armed response unit said the car failed to stop and eventually hit the wall and several parked cars .
police say the driver fled from the car , which had a false number plate .
a passenger was detained at the scene .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: the forgotten guide that took me to another time
text: the forgotten guide that took me to another time

documents.title: road closed after car ends up in ditch
text: police have closed a road in cotgrave because of `` large amounts of standing water '' due to the heavy rainfall last night .
stragglethorpe road is closed after a car ended up in a ditch .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: homes without power - update
text: i 've just spoken to western power which says about 11,000 homes are still without power across the midlands - it was 13,000 earlier .
i 'm told engineers are looking to repair more than 200 faults to the network after overnight snow and ice .
warwickshire and worcestershire are said to be the worst affected areas .
a western power spokeswoman says there are about 7,800 affected properties in the west midlands , and 3,600 in the east midlands .
author: Stephanie Barnard
BBC News

documents.title: flood warning in place for leicestershire
text: the environment agency has issued one flood warning and 12 flood alerts for leicestershire this morning .
the warning is in place at river sence from temple mill to sheepy magna because heavy and persistent rain is expected .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: arrests after 'shots fired ' in car crash
text: nottinghamshire police said there were reports a firearm was discharged shortly before or after the collision .

documents.title: one lane reopens after m1 crash
text: one lane has reopened following a crash involving an hgv on the m1 southbound between junctions 20 and 19 for lutterworth .
there are still reports of 20-minute delays as one lane remains closed .
only 1 lane is now closed on the # m1 southbound between j20 and j19 .
our area team are working to clear a significant spillage and treat the carriageway .
there are delays of 20 minutes on approach .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: delays after 'car stuck on tram lines '
text: there are delays to tram services this morning because of a car which was stuck in the tracks on lenton bridge .
tram operator net said the the car had now been removed but there were still some delays to the network .
service update : the car has now been removed from lenton bridge and we are now able to run through to all destinations .
we will have some dealys to service but will be working hard to get all trams back on time .

all the best for 2018

documents.title: east midlands weather : outbreaks of wintry showers
text: there will be outbreaks of rain , sleet and snow gradually easing away during the morning with a few wintry showers in some parts of the region .
drier , sunnier conditions will emerge throughout the day but it will be cold with brisk winds .
this evening will remain cold with largely clear skies and a brisk breeze and frost likely by dawn .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: m1 delays after hgv crash
text: two lanes are closed on the m1 southbound between junctions 20 and 19 near lutterworth because of an accident .
police are warning drivers of `` hazardous '' conditions due to snow in some parts of the region .
some properties in oakham and the surrounding areas are currently without power .
western power distribution said engineers were working to restore the power as soon as they could .
2 lanes ( of 3 ) remain closed on the # m1 southbound between j20 and j19 near # lutterworth due to a collision involving an hgv .
recovery is now complete , however we are now working to deal with a large diesel spillage .
there are delays of 45 minutes on approach .
it was chaos when i crawled past it at 4.30 and i was crawling north bound
45 mins try about 2hrs
@ twitterid i 'm not surprised there was an accident the # m1 was horrendous earlier today with no lanes being fully clear at 02:00hrs
@ twitterid
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News

documents.title: newark flat fire : teenager charged with arson
text: a teenager has appeared in court charged with arson with intent to endanger life following a flat fire .
more than 20 firefighters were called to barnby gate in newark , nottinghamshire , at about 01:00 on saturday .
the 18-year-old , from newark , was arrested and charged and appeared at nottingham magistrates ' court on tuesday .
he has been remanded in custody and is next due at nottingham crown court on 23 january .
nottinghamshire police said no one was injured in the blaze .
author: Sonia Kataria
BBC News Online

documents.title: join us for our live coverage
text: good morning nottinghamshire , derbyshire and leicestershire .
we hope everyone had a lovely christmas .
i will be writing the updates on today 's live page with all the latest news , sport , weather and travel .
if you 'd like to get in touch with us , you can send an email , or use facebook or twitter .
author: Maryam Qaiser
BBC News
